articles.author: Wayne Cole
articles.title: Asia shares cheered by hopes of early rate cuts - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares rallied for a fourth straight session on Monday after markets priced in earlier rate cuts in the United States and Europe, bullish wagers that will be tested by a swarm of central bank speakers this week.
articles.content: SYDNEY, Nov 6 (Reuters) - Asian shares rallied for a fourth straight session on Monday after markets priced in earlier rate cuts in the United States and Europe, bullish wagers that will be tested by… [+3747 chars]
